titles.title: A bill to remove the designation of the third Monday in February as a legal public holiday.

bill.summary: 2/9/1988--Introduced. Amends Federal law to remove the designation of the third Monday in February as a legal public holiday relating to Washington's Birthday. Makes conforming changes regarding contested elections, rules of any Federal agency, and rules of certain Federal courts.
